  • Constructor Details

    • Mesh

      public Mesh​(java.lang.String name, Model model, long context_handle, Material initialMaterial)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the file or the models name in the file.
      model -
      context_handle - The handle of the context this is being bound to.
      initialMaterial - The Material this mesh will start off with, more can be added after construction. If this is null then the material will be set to the default material of the engine.

    • bindModel

      public Mesh bindModel​(int draw_usage)
      Adds the index model to open GL using the draw_option.
      Parameters:
      draw_usage - This hints the GL Implementation on how the data provided will be used.
